name: Case Study Salud en Adultos Mayores
description:
First Case Study

The goal is to design a digital solution for people over 60 who need tools to monitor their health.

This challenge is due to the fact that today a large part of the elderly do not carry out a clear monitoring of their health because they have difficulties organizing medical studies either digitally, because they do not have the ability to understand the interfaces, or physically, because they often lose or forget where they leave their results or medical prescriptions.

Context: Buenos Aires Argentina.


https://www.behance.net/mariaiaureggi


Appreciate in advance for any feedbacks!
